TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed FormRegionCustomActionAddressLike extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定如何对用户执行自定义操作时显示的目标项进行寻址。

span.span: Specifies how to address the target item that appears when the user executes the custom action.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用要指定你希望如何用户执行自定义操作时显示的目标项的值。Use the value to specify how you would like to address the target item that appears when the user executes the custom action. 有关自定义操作的信息，请参阅[Outlook 窗体区域中的自定义操作](/visualstudio/vsto/custom-actions-in-outlook-form-regions)。For information about custom actions, see [Custom Actions in Outlook Form Regions](/visualstudio/vsto/custom-actions-in-outlook-form-regions). 枚举由属性的接口。 enumeration is used by the property of the interface.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomActionAddressLike Forward = int32(2)

summary.span: 将新项作为对原始项的转发。

span.span: Makes the new item a forward of the original item.

summary.span: 如果创建新的邮件，此选项将清除新邮件的“发件人”和“抄送”字段。

span.span: If you create a new mail message, this option clears the **To** and **CC** fields of the new message.

summary.span: 新邮件的“主题”字段中显示的文本包含原始“主题”字段中显示的文本。

span.span: The text that appears in the **Subject** field of the new message contains the text that appeared in the original **Subject** field.

summary.span: 原始项上的附件将复制到新项。

span.span: The attachments on the original item are copied to the new item.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomActionAddressLike Reply = int32(0)

summary.span: 让新项成为对原始项的回复。

span.span: Makes the new item a reply to the original item.

summary.span: 如果创建新邮件，此选项会将邮件的“发件人”字段中显示的地址复制到新邮件的“收件人”字段中。

span.span: If you create a new mail message, this option copies the address that appears in the **From** field of the message into the **To** field of the new message.

summary.span: 新邮件的“主题”字段中显示的文本包含原始“主题”字段中显示的文本。

span.span: The text that appears in the **Subject** field of the new message contains the text that appeared in the original **Subject** field.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomActionAddressLike ReplyAll = int32(1)

summary.span: 将新项作为对原始项的所有发件人和收件人的回复。

span.span: Makes the new item a reply to all of the senders and recipients of the original item.

summary.span: 如果创建新的邮件项，此选项会将邮件的“发件人”和“收件人”字段中显示的地址复制到目标窗体的“收件人”字段中。

span.span: If you create a new mail item, this option copies the addresses that appear in the **From** and **To** fields of the message into the **To** field of the target form.

summary.span: 此选项还会将邮件的“抄送”字段中显示的地址复制到目标窗体的“抄送”字段中。

span.span: This option also copies the addresses that appear in the **CC** field of the message into the **CC** field of the target form.

summary.span: 新邮件的“主题”字段中显示的文本包含原始“主题”字段中显示的文本。

span.span: The text that appears in the **Subject** field of the new message contains the text that appeared in the original **Subject** field.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomActionAddressLike ReplyToFolder = int32(3)

summary.span: 如果创建新的投递项，此选项会将此项投递到活动文件夹。

span.span: If you create a new Post item, this option posts the item to the active folder.

summary.span: 此项还会将“主题”字段中显示的文本复制到新项的“会话”字段中。

span.span: This item also copies the text that appears in the **Subject** field into the **Conversation** field of the new item.

summary.span: 然后清除新项的“主题”字段。

span.span: It then clears the **Subject** field of the new item.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomActionAddressLike Response = int32(4)

summary.span: 使自定义操作按钮在单击工作区的“响应”组中的“投票”按钮时显示。

span.span: Causes the custom action button to appear when you click the **Vote** button in the **Respond** group of the Ribbon.
